title: Titanic[1997]DVDRip[eng]AAC.x264-XP17
description:
Behold, the first rip of Titanic that'll fit on a CD. The quality is roughly the same as those 1200-1600 meg XviD encodes and better than the 900MB FANTASTiC encode. And no, the movie isn't actually encapsulated in MKV, but is MP4 with a re-named extension for convinience.

***VIDEO***
Codec:                 H264
Duration:              3:06:28
Resolution:            672 x 288
Frames Per Second:     25.000
Bitrate (kbps):        436

***AUDIO***
AAC 44.1 KHz 77 kbps VBR Stereo

Encode date: 7/31/2008

***PLAYBACK***

Download and Install K-Lite Mega Codec Pack. It'll come with Media Player Classic which is the recommended player.

If you got problems opening the MKV with WinAMP, right click the player>Options>Preferences>Input>Select Nullsoft Directshow Decoder>Configure> Add MKV to the extension list.

Playing with WinAMP is not recommended, 'cuz ya may not see subtitles. Also you may wanna crank the pre-amp up, 'cuz the audio is kinda low.
